page.title: 09THE O.K. CAFE'S DAY (2)
page.content: About 5% of customers are foreign: Dutch,French and German lorry drivers. In the summer a lot of Dutch and Swedish cyclists stop as well as coaches of foreign school children on trips.The cafe has been in existence for more than 20 years. It closes at 7:00 p.m. and they have finished cleaning by 7:30 p.m.She has two full time staff and three part time staff who all arrive by bicycles and have been working there for 20 years. During the course of a day,150_200 lorry drivers will have called. The owner eventually goes to bed somewhere between 9 and 10 o,clock.She does not serve on Sundays.She has a little girl who is looked after by a lady who comes in at 7:00 in the morning.The cafe was broken into in 1983.
